 Jp my move was legal and I find it very creative on my part. Just because 
you wont let megs die by modeing over and over again doesnt mean you can get 
out of this one. Also I do apolagize for embers who did have chars in there 
that I didnt give you time. Im sorry but it was the only way I could make 
sure that this worked. As yans said he approved every step . If the poll 
calls it legal then I have some points to bring up wich obviously make it 
impossible for all the chars in that base to live. I await the tally of the 
votes.

--part1_6b.f965456.27b49e49_boundary
